content.text:
[@SoapDog](@gaQw6z30GpfsW9k8V5ED4pHrg8zmrqku24zTSAINhRg=.ed25519) 

Do you host issues and such on sourcehut as well? I always try to click builds/todo/lists but it always asks me to log in first. I might just be spoiled by having everything public on GitHub/GitLab, but I've had a hard time wrapping my head around how I can check out bug reports and discussions for a sourcehut project.
